GetOrientation(in ReadOnlySpan<Vector2>)

Retrieves the orientation of a set of vertices using the Shoelace formula (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shoelace_formula)

public static float GetOrientation(in ReadOnlySpan<Vector2> vertices)

Parameters

vertices ReadOnlySpan<Vector2>

The vertices.

Returns

float

Twice the area enclosed by the vertices. The vertices are clockwise-oriented if the value is positive. The vertices are counter-clockwise-oriented if the value is negative.

InRightHalfPlaneOf(Vector2, in Line)

Determines whether a point is within the right half-plane of a line in the traditional cartesian coordinate system.

public static bool InRightHalfPlaneOf(this Vector2 point, in Line line)

Parameters

point Vector2

The point.

line Line

The line.

Returns

bool

Whether point is in the right half-plane of line. Collinear points are never in the right half-plane of the line.
